thread.title: Oliver Enlists Deadly Allies in Arrow Disbanded Trailer
thread.title_full: Oliver Enlists Deadly Allies in Arrow Disbanded Trailer

author: Spencer Perry
title: Oliver Enlists Deadly Allies in Arrow Disbanded Trailer
text:
SHARE Oliver enlists deadly allies in Arrow Disbanded trailer 
The CW has released the official trailer for the next episode of Arrow , which sees Oliver enlisting the aid of the Bratva to help him with Prometheus. Check it out in the player below! 
Titled “Disbanded” and set to air March 29, the episode is officially described as follows: 
“Diggle (David Ramsey) and Felicity (Emily Bett Rickards) are shocked by Oliver’s (Stephen Amell) decision to call on the Bratva to help take down Prometheus (Josh Segurra). Concerned the Bratva may overstep, Diggle has a hard conversation with Oliver about what happens if things go south. Meanwhile, Felicity learns something shocking at Helix. 
J.J. Makaro directed the episode which was written by Rebecca Bellotto. 
Speaking of Felicity, series executive producer Marc Guggenheim took to Twitter to share a look at the character’s appearance in next week’s episode of DC’s Legends of Tomorrow where she’ll be suiting up for the first time… 
Arrow stars Stephen Amell as Oliver Queen, David Ramsey as John Diggle, Willa Holland as Thea Queen, Emily Bett Rickards as Felicity Smoak, John Barrowman as Malcom Merlyn, with Paul Blackthorne as Detective Lance. The series is executive produced by Greg Berlanti, Marc Guggenheim, Andrew Kreisberg and Sarah Schechter. Concept art from next week’s Legends of Tomorrow… pic.twitter.com/9kJLjwjZNO
